## Loading Packages 

```{r load-packages}
library(tidyverse)
```

## Loading Data

```{r load-data}
seamstresses <- read_csv("data/seamstresses.csv")
genealogy <- read_csv("data/genealogy.csv")
```

## City Distribution
 
```{r city-bar-chart}
seamstresses %>% 
  filter(state == "MA", is.na(city) == FALSE) %>% 
  ggplot(mapping = aes(x = city)) +
  geom_bar() +
  coord_flip()
```
 ## Job Titles
 
```{r job-titles-bar}

# Figure out how to get R to count all instances of each word, rather than full phrases
seamstresses %>% 
  filter(is.na(job_title) == FALSE) %>% 
  ggplot(mapping = aes(x = job_title)) +
  geom_bar() +
  coord_flip()

```
 
```{r fix-dates}
genealogy %>% 
  filter(is.na(ad_date == TRUE)) %>% 
  select(name, ad_date, ad_id) %>% 
  mutate(ad_date = case_when(ad_id == "Worcester1844" ~ 1844))

```


```{r job-titles}
seamstresses_separated <- seamstresses %>% 
  separate_rows(job_title, sep = "; ") %>% 
  mutate(job_title = fct_collapse(job_title,
    Milliner = c("Milliner", "milliner"),
    Dressmaker = c("Dressmaker", "dressmaker"),
    Tailor = c("Tailor"),
    Tailoress = c("Tailoress", "tailoress"),
    Mantuamaker = c("Mantuamaker", "mantuamaker", "Mantua-Maker"),
    Apprentices = c("apprentices")
  ))

ggplot(seamstresses_separated, mapping = aes(x = job_title)) +
  geom_bar() +
  coord_flip()
```

```{r job-title-by-year}
seamstresses_separated %>% 
  filter(job_title == c("Dressmaker", "Mantuamaker", "Milliner", "Tailoress")) %>% 
  ggplot(mapping = aes(x = year, fill = job_title)) +
  geom_density(alpha = 0.5) +
  scale_fill_viridis_d()

```
